Details

Exception: the settings file mechanism isn't supported on this interpreter. This indicates that this is an older interpreter that doesn't support the "special files" feature, so we can't save or load the global settings file. `class `**`SettingsNotSupportedException`**` :   `[`Exception`](../object/Exception.html)
